org.testfx.api

Class FxAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testfx.api.FxAssert

  • @Unstable(reason="method signatures need fine-tuning")
public final class FxAssert
extends java.lang.Object
    All TestFX tests should use verifyThat(Node, Matcher, Function) when writing tests, so that the developer can use DebugUtils to provide additional info as to why a failed test failed.

    • Constructor Summary

      FxAssert()
